text:
Hello <@UEKMY50SU>
Can you please help me on data fetching from hubDB. Actullay, I want to fetch data with passing column value like <column name>=<value>. Its only fetch data with row ID. please suggest how can manage this?

Just in-case anyone else searches with this question we have documentation on it:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions/reference#redirect-by-sending-a-header>
